nodes.text: The Fortune's Folly was a pleasure barge owned by the Mandalorian Bask Sunn, a Dar'manda lieutenant and recruitment officer. In 3626 BBY, the starship participated in the assault on the Spirit of Vengeance II.

The Fortune's Folly was a combination pleasure barge and raiding vessel used by the Dar'manda which provided an opulent lifestyle for the officers of the organization. The lower ranked members of the organization, however, were housed in cramped quarters and lived an impoverished existence, with only glimpses of the benefits offered to the uppermost echelons of the organization as an incentive for advancement.
